com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
Interface Recorder

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRecorder
public interface Recorder

This Interface layout the default set of recorder methods and behavours that all complete implementations of a good Recorder should have. All recorders that are developed and delivered with this toolkit will implement this interface

Field Summary
static int COORDINATE_1D
          Sets the recorder to record a single dimension of the haptic device
static int COORDINATE_2D
          Sets the recorder to record a two dimension of the haptic device

 void addRecordListener(RecorderListener listener)
          Adds a recorder listener to recorder, this will provide notification of changes to recorder
